subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Some notable names, including Graeme McDowell, Ángel Cabrera and Jim Furyk, were sent home when the rain-delayed second round was completed Saturday morning.
snippet: Some notable names, including Graeme McDowell, Ángel Cabrera and Jim Furyk, were sent home when the rain-delayed second round was completed Saturday morning.
